name: R5-MeasureReportType-R4-MeasureReportType
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 MeasureReportType into a FHIR R4 MeasureReportType

element.display: A data exchange report that contains data-of-interest for the measure (i.e. data that is needed to calculate the measure)

target.display: A data collection report that contains data-of-interest for the measure.

element.display: An individual report that provides information on the performance for a given measure with respect to a single subject.

target.display: An individual report that provides information on the performance for a given measure with respect to a single subject.

element.display: A subject list report that includes a listing of subjects that satisfied each population criteria in the measure.

target.display: A subject list report that includes a listing of subjects that satisfied each population criteria in the measure.

element.display: A summary report that returns the number of members in each population criteria for the measure.

target.display: A summary report that returns the number of members in each population criteria for the measure.
